statements: SELECT * FROM customer_orders;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customer_orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, delivery_address FROM customer_orders WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, delivery_address FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, payment_method, delivery_address FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date < current_date() AND payment_method = 'Cash' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT city, state, postcode FROM delivery_addresses WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM customer_orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, street_address, city, state FROM customer_orders JOIN delivery_addresses ON customer_orders.order_id = delivery_addresses.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, city, state, postcode FROM customer_orders JOIN delivery_addresses ON customer_orders.order_id = delivery_addresses.customer_id WHERE state = 'California'
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryAddresses WHERE city='New York' AND state='NY';
SELECT payment_id, expiry_date FROM PaymentInformation;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryAddresses WHERE city='New York' AND state='NY';
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM PaymentInformation WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM delivery_addresses ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address_line1, city, postal_code FROM delivery_addresses WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT driver_name, contact_number FROM delivery_drivers;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_price ASC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_price FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_price) AS total_spent FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500
SELECT * FROM delivery_addresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY address_line1
SELECT di.customer_id, di.card_number, dd.driver_name FROM payment_information di JOIN delivery_drivers dd ON di.customer_id = dd.driver_id
SELECT * FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, city FROM delivery_addresses WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE card_expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, price, description FROM menu_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_orders ON customers.customer_id = customer_orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM customers JOIN delivery_addresses ON customers.customer_id = delivery_addresses.customer_id WHERE state = 'CA';
